software.comprehensive_overview: Biopython is a set of freely available tools for biological computation, written in Python. It is a distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and applications which address the needs of current and future work in bioinformatics.
software.core_features: Sequence manipulation, molecular structure analysis, Phylogenetics, population genetics, functional genomics, and more.

software.comprehensive_overview: GROMACS is a versatile package for molecular dynamics simulations, used primarily to simulate the Newtonian equations of motion for systems with hundreds to millions of particles.
software.core_features: Molecular dynamics simulations, Energy minimization, Free energy calculations, Trajectory analysis, and more.

software.comprehensive_overview: SPAdes is a de novo genome assembly tool designed for single-cell and multi-cells bacterial data.
software.core_features: Genome assembly, Error correction, Mismatch correction, Contigging, and Scaffolding.
